sentences.sContent: He went into exile to escape political imprisonment.
sentences.sCn: 他为了逃避政治监禁而流亡国外。

sentences.sContent: He spent many years in enforced exile.
sentences.sCn: 他被强制流放了许多年。

synos.tran: 流放，充军；放逐，被放逐者；流犯

remMethod.val: ex(出) ＋ i ＋ le(拼音： 了) → 出国了 → 放逐， 流放

trans.tranCn: 流放，流亡；被流放者，流亡国外者
trans.tranOther: a situation in which you are forced to leave your country and live in another country, especially for political reasons

trans.tranCn: 流放， 放逐， 使流亡
trans.tranOther: to force someone to leave their country, especially for political reasons
